item.title: Linux命令 firewall
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: 不可不知的centos7 firewalld 防火墙的使用 CentOS 7 firewalld使用简介 Red_Hat Using_Firewalls CentOS7下Firewall防火墙配置用法详解 yum install firewalld firewall-config systemctl start firewalld systemctl disable
